# Summary

This book offers reproducible code snippets to assist users in working with BiocPy representations. Beyond the representations detailed here, BiocPy also facilitates delayed operations and the analysis of multi-modal single-cell datasets in Python.

Check out the [BiocPy GitHub organization](https://github.com/BiocPy) for the most up-to-date information.

### Core contributors

- [Jayaram Kancherla](https://github.com/jkanche)
